title: Footie Award Nominees! + Week 18 Recap, Chopping Block - Fantasy Football Podcast for 1/11
description:
The Fantasy Footballers are back with a special episode! On today’s fantasy football podcast, the nominees for our 2021 fantasy football awards: The Footies! Plus, Andy, Mike, and Jason react to a wild Week 18! What’s the dynasty outlook for guys like Rashaad Penny and Justin Herbert? All this, plus big NFL coaching news, and a look ahead to Super Wild Card Weekend. Manage your redraft, keeper, and dynasty fantasy football teams with the #1 fantasy football podcast. -- Fantasy Football Podcast for January 11th, 2022.
  
 Vote now for the 2021 FOOTIES (fantasy football awards) at FootclanVote.com
  
 (02:00) - Week 18 Reactions
 (06:55) - NFL News (Coaches, Super Wild Card Weekend)
 (26:00) - Week 18 Studs
 (42:00)  - Week 18 Duds
 (48:55) - Footie Nominations for 2021 (Fantasy Football Awards)
  
 Connect with the show:
